version_description: - Changed the application icon.

– Have made the toolbar not hiding.
– Fixed various bugs.

We added something for which you will return more often!
– Added tab "Random" wallpapers.
– We returned the good icon.

– Change the icon to a pleasant and attractive.
– Added advertising.
– Fixed a minor bug.

– Added tab "stream" - online broadcasting wallpapers installed by users.
– The tab "popular" is removed.
- Added a link to the menu on the paid version of the application without ads.

Improved
- Accelerated the work of the feed, switching tabs, go to the Wallpaper screen and back to the feed.
– Fade-in preview in the feed.
- Auto resume of the stream.

New
- Fitting Wallpapers for iPhone XR, XS and XS Max.

- Amazing! Exclusive wallpapers available only for Wallcraft! Created by our artists.
- The name "Wallcraft" at the start of the application.
- Minor improvements and fixes.

- Similar Wallpapers and Wallpaper information when swipe up on the Wallpaper screen!
- Improved work of the stream.

Added the ability to get full access to all content and disable ads forever.

Corrected errors and improved stability of the application.

Added push notifications, now you can immediately find out about new collections and other new products.

And also fixed bugs and increased stability of the application.

We present you a new section "Hits"! In this section, every 8 hours will appear wallpapers from our collection, which were very popular at various times Wallcraft existence. You can get to this section by clicking on the tab with a timer that counts down the time until a new portion of “hits” appears. We very much hope that this functionality will help you find interesting wallpapers for your phone.

In addition, we fixed the errors and improved the stability of the application.

Added the ability to subscribe, which gives access to exclusive content and disables all advertising in the application!
Fixed bugs and increased the stability of the application.

Added a separate section, which contains only exclusive wallpapers.
Quick access to this section you can get from the application menu.
Fixed bugs and increased the stability of the application.

We added a link to our instagram account in the menu, in which we will publish the best wallpapers of the day, tell you about new useful features of the application we are working on.
Changed the format of displaying advertising in the feed, as well as corrected errors and increased the stability of the application.
It happened! What you waited so long, but were afraid to say! New, effective icon! :(
- To solve the problem with displaying ads to unlock exclusive wallpapers, we added alternative ad networks.

We added a link to our instagram account in the menu, in which we will publish the best wallpapers of the day, tell you about new useful features of the application we are working on.
Changed the format of displaying advertising in the feed, as well as corrected errors and increased the stability of the application.
Fixed the crash of the application when trying to unlock the second exclusive wallpaper.

Added a separate section, which contains only exclusive wallpapers.
Quick access to this section you can get from the application menu.
Fixed bugs and increased the stability of the application.

Changed the format of displaying advertising in the feed.
Fixed bugs and increased the stability of the application.

We present you a new section "Hits"! In this section, every 8 hours will appear wallpapers from our collection, which were very popular at various times Wallcraft existence. You can get to this section by clicking on the tab with a timer that counts down the time until a new portion of “hits” appears. We very much hope that this functionality will help you find interesting wallpapers for your phone.

In addition, we fixed the errors and improved the stability of the application.

Added the ability to subscribe, which gives access to exclusive content and disables all advertising in the application!
Fixed bugs and increased the stability of the application.

Added push notifications, now you can immediately find out about new collections and other new products.

And also fixed bugs and increased stability of the application.
Corrected a critical error that caused the application to crash.
Added a section with the best exclusive wallpapers in the tabs panel for faster and more convenient access to them.

Introducing the new Double Wallpaper section! In this section, the wallpapers are interconnected by a single plot, ideas or theme. They are intended for installation on Home and Lock screens. All wallpapers in this section are designed specifically for you by our artists. You can get to the new section through the side menu. We really hope you enjoy this new content.

In addition, we have adapted and optimized the application for iOS 13.

Added a section with the best double wallpapers in the tabs panel for more convenient and quick access to them.

And also fixed bugs and increased stability of the application.

Added the ability to get full access to all content and disable ads forever.

Corrected errors and improved stability of the application.
You won’t believe it, but in this release we fixed errors and improved the stability of the application.
Corrected errors and increased stability of the application.
We fixed critical errors that led to the crash of the application.
Corrected errors and increased stability of the application.

- Fixed a couple of errors, improved the code.
- Raised the minimum version to iOS 12.
- We launched a couple of tests to make you like it better.

- Displayed similar on the wallpaper screen.
- Improved code and fixed bugs.

Added age selection. This will provide more relevant content.
And also fixed bugs and increased stability of the application.
We connected advertising networks for our current advertising. Well, according to your numerous requests, we have fixed errors and increased the stability of the application.
Minor update, slightly increased stability.
Minor update, slightly increased stability.
Improved the tops of exclusive wallpapers and double wallpapers, now you will love them even more!
Fixing bugs that appeared in iOS 14.

We present you a new opportunity to receive single exclusive wallpapers for Wallcraft currency! Watch ads, earn rewards and unlock any single exclusive wallpaper. Try it now!

In addition, we fixed bugs and increased the stability of the application.
Fixed minor bugs from the latest release.
We added a test only for new users for showing fullscreen ads, searching for new combinations of advertising and possible replacement for old ad formats, there will be more ads in this update.

- Optimized for the new iPhone 12, Mini, Pro and Max.
- Added a "report a problem" button to the menu.
- Added the name of the application to the main screen.
- Added testing of displaying ads on application launch.

Now, using Wallcraft coins, you can also get double wallpapers. Earn coins and unlock any double wallpapers.

In addition, we fixed bugs and increased the stability of the application.
Fixed a bug with the application crash immediately after launch.
Get ready! To the Live Wallpapers! Yes, we made them, too!

Fixed various bugs.
The "hits" tab has been removed, it will no longer be there.
This time corrected mistakes and increased the stability of the application.
Add a request to Target according to the new rules. And on numerous user requests, we corrected mistakes and increased the stability of the application.
纠正错误并增加了申请的稳定性。
我们很高兴地通知您，这次我们修复了一些小错误，以提高应用程序的稳定性。
错误修复和稳定性改进。
我们不断让 Wallcraft 成为更适合您的应用程序。
重新設計了顯示個性化廣告的請求窗口。 修復了一個錯誤。
根据您的少量请求，我们修复了错误并提高了应用程序的稳定性。
在此更新中，我们将通过 18+ 壁纸的存在来取悦成年观众
修正了一些小错误。
在此面向成人观众的版本中，我们肯定添加了 18 幅以上的壁纸。
一个小错误是固定的。
在这里修正了一点，那里修正了一点
小錯誤修復和 sdks 更新

我們添加了帳戶，因此您不會丟失您的寶貴收藏！
並且還修復了您寫信給我們的問題。
與廣告網絡一起使用的細微調整。
- 删除下载壁纸前的授权窗口
- 删除了登录帐户以接收币的窗口
